info.title: NX-Save-Sync
info.author: Xc98
info.description: Sync save files between switch and pc
info.details:
NX Save Sync is a switch homebrew app to quickly sync save files between switch and an emulator.

Controls:
Press L / R in main menu to move between tabs or move between pages when selecting a title
Press ZL / ZR to change the selected user

Usage:
For a guide on how to use switch / pc app, check github repo:
https://github.com/Xc987/NX-Save-Sync

changelog:
Add gui for pc app and make switch app gui a bit better
Fix save file commiting on switch app
Add changeable pc app themes
Remove option exit switch app while waiting for pc to start server or for pc to connect to switch
